name: Shinobi Shift
description:
Shinobi Shift is a first-person platformer with shooter elements where you can control the time! Rewind, slow down and even freeze time as you break through neon locations and hordes of enemies, throwing shurikens in different directions!

Features
  • Cinematic gameplay that makes you feel like an action hero
  • Bright and catchy cyberpunk graphics
  • Interesting levels that challenge the player with their difficulty
